activities: Applied Discovery Inc., is an Application Service Provider (ASP) in the Electronic Discovery business.  Personal information would be in the form of electronic discovery data and information pertaining to litigation involving EU entities
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Dispute resolution would be through an EU data protection authority (DPA); for Switzerland, it would be the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
